level.heading: Education and incentive program.
level.text: The Mayor shall implement an education and incentive program, which shall include the following:
Low cost spay and neuter clinic services; and
Program for education of animal owners.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-30
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-30, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 8-1801.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to law 3-30, see Mayor's Order 83-206, August 2, 1983.
